articles.headline: Salt LMS Feature Showcase and Workshop 2026
articles.summary: GRC Solutions hosts an exclusive live showcase webinar for the latest advancements in their Salt LMS platform, led by CTO Joe Bennett, to demonstrate new tools for efficient compliance training.

articles.headline: Upcoming Events Including AML/CTF Reforms and Responsible Manager Workshop
articles.summary: GRC Solutions announces upcoming events in February 2026 such as AML/CTF Reforms Unpacked, Responsible Manager Workshop in Sydney, and Salt LMS Feature Showcase, indicating active engagement and product development.

articles.headline: GRC Solutions’ Award-Winning eLearning for AML/CTF Training
articles.summary: GRC Solutions provides award-winning eLearning for AML/CTF training designed to meet AUSTRAC requirements, with tailored courses for various sectors including financial services, law firms, pubs & clubs, and real estate.

articles.headline: Positive Client Testimonials Highlight Bespoke Solutions and Platform Features
articles.summary: Clients like HCF and BankVic praise GRC Solutions for delivering visually impactful bespoke learning solutions on budget and ahead of schedule, and for the innovative 'Adaptive' learning feature in Salt platform.

posts.summary: Announcement of a new partnership with Clio, enhancing service capabilities.
Launch of a modernised AML/CTF eLearning course in response to regulatory changes.
Announcement of new hire David Kuczynski, expanding local presence in Queensland.

message:
Hi [Name],

I came across the recent partnership with Clio and the launch of your new AML/CTF eLearning course—impressive moves that clearly show GRC Solutions is on an exciting path. I’m with a private equity firm that focuses on regulatory technology, and I’d love to learn more about your growth plans and how you see the landscape evolving. If you’re open to it, I’d appreciate the chance for a casual chat over coffee or a call.

Best,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Firm]
potential_actions: Invite the founders and executives for a round of golf at a prestigious local golf course to celebrate their recent partnership with Clio and discuss future collaboration opportunities.
Arrange a lunch meeting at a trendy café in Brisbane to personally congratulate them on the successful launch of their modernised AML/CTF eLearning course and to learn more about their future plans.
Attend the Salt LMS Feature Showcase and Workshop 2026 to connect with GRC Solutions' team members and engage in discussions about their innovative approaches to eLearning.

Send a personalized gift related to their recent expansion in Queensland, such as a high-quality bottle of local wine or a custom-made notebook featuring highlights of their new hire, David Kuczynski.
Introduce them to key contacts in your network who could provide synergies with their offerings, and invite them out for coffee afterward to discuss the introductions made.
Attend the upcoming AML/CTF Reforms and Responsible Manager Workshop and take the opportunity to meet with their executives to congratulate them in person on their award-winning eLearning solutions.
